traitDefinitions.name: Little stinger
traitDefinitions.desc: This below average sized stinger is bad for defense.

RNG.name: Range
RNG.desc: Number of cells a bee can fly before having to return to the hive.

STR_POLLEN.name: Pollen Storage
STR_POLLEN.desc: The amount of pollen a bee can hold.

STR_NECTAR.name: Nectar Storage
STR_NECTAR.desc: The amount of nectar a bee can hold.

STR_WATER.name: Water Storage
STR_WATER.desc: The amount of water a bee can hold.

SPD_FLY.name: Flight Speed
SPD_FLY.desc: The rate at which a bee can traverse 1 cell.

SPD_CLT.name: Collection Speed
SPD_CLT.desc: The rate at which a bee can collect 1 resource from a node.

SPD_DEP.name: Deposit Speed
SPD_DEP.desc: The rate at which a bee can deposits 1 resource from its resource baskets.

PRD_HONEY.name: %(resource)s Production Rate
PRD_HONEY.desc: The rate at which a bee can produce %(resource)s.

YLD_HONEY.name: %(resource) Production Yield
YLD_HONEY.desc: The amount of %(resource)s a bee can produce.

COST_HONEY_NECTAR.name: %(resource)s Production Cost (%(cost)s)
COST_HONEY_NECTAR.desc: The amount of %(cost)s a bee needs to produce %(resource)s.

PRD_WAX.desc: The rate at which a bee can produce %(resource)s.
